workflow.title: . . . create Casebook and sync it with TheHive üêù

properties.description:
Takes in any observable:
-> create a new case in SecureX  casebook case
-> create an associated The Hive ticket
-> sync all subsequent observables that are added
-> starts every applicable Cortex Anaylzer

*** PLEASE MAKE SURE TO SELECT THE NEWLY CREATED CASE BEFORE ADDING NEW OBSERVABLES TO YOUR ACTIVE CASE! ***

properties.description:
this table is a 1:1 mapping between the SecureX Casebook Case and the reflect TheHive Case via the ID's

...especially when adding observables to the Casebook we need to sync and reflect it in the correpsonding TheHive Case

properties.script:
list_Analyzers = $activity.definition_activity_01J2U06E88GE17TUJXAp5Amm7hCKBdKnJhk.output.jsonpath_queries.id$
string_Analyzers = str(list_Analyzers).strip('[]')

result = sanitized_Analyzers.replace("'","")
